A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never worked so hard to like or understand a movie. The more I want TLJ the more I hate it. The story or director suffers from the Dunning-Kruger effect. Rian Johnson has a cognitive bias in which he believes that he is smarter and more capable than he really is. Essentially\, he does not possess the skills needed to recognize his own incompetence with this film. There's fan films out there with better plots. In short\, this is the worst Star Wars movie ever made.
